posts.post_content:
Lot of 29 raw Polar Bears. Condition ranges from poor to very good. No trimming, re-coloring, bleaching, shaving, waxing, etc. Average condition is good. [STRIKE]$600. [/STRIKE] SOLD

Here's what you get:

Barry (fair)
Brain (gd-vg)
Bridwell (gd-vg)
Camnitz (gd-vg)

Downey, bat (fair)
Downey, field (good)
Egan (gd-vg)
Freeman (vg)
Ganzel (gd-vg)
Hayden (good)
Herzog (gd-vg)
Hoblitzell (good)
